name: NG
0:
”Alexa, ask n. g. to turn off diffuser”
”Alexa, ask n. g. to turn on diffuser”
”Alexa, ask n. g. to set color of diffuser to yellow”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. g.
des:
We strive to make your home smarter and more convenient. 
You can now voice control your home appliances, just simply say: 

On/Off
"Alexa, ask n. g. to turn on diffuser"
"Alexa, ask n. g. to turn off diffuser"

Color/Effect
"Alexa, ask n. g. to set color of diffuser to yellow"
"Alexa, ask n. g. to set smooth effect for diffuser"

Mist Level
"Alexa, ask n. g. to set diffuser to mild"
"Alexa, ask n. g. to set diffuser to strong"

Timer
"Alexa, ask n.g. to turn off diffuser after 1 hour"
"Alexa, ask n.g. to turn off diffuser after 3 hours"
"Alexa, ask n.g. to turn off diffuser after 6 hours"

Indefinite Diffusing
"Alexa, ask n. g. to keep diffuser on"

To get started:
1, You'll need a NG Appliance.
2, Set it up to Wi-Fi network(has internet access) by using our NG APP which can be downloaded at Google Play or Apple Store. 
After that you can start using the skill given that you have already linked your account to it.
